description:
Adds a series of preview handlers to Windows Vista, Windows 7, Outlook 2007 and Outlook 2010 that are useful for software developers.

The pack currently supports:
ActionScript (.as)
ASPX (.aspx)
C# (.cs)
CSS (.css)
Diff (.diff, .patch)
DOS (.bat, .cmd)
JavaScript (.js)
Ruby (.rb, .rhtml, .rjs) thanks to Ivan Porto Carrero
SQL (.sql)
VB (.vb)
View Screenshots: http://blog.tatham.oddie.com.au/2006/12/20/vista-and-office-2007-preview-handler-pack-released/
